text: viśvāsaya tæbūvangengē hṛdayan allāhvada, ohu pahaḷa karana lada satya (āyāvan)da sitā biya vī vevlana kālaya (tavamat) pæmiṇiyē nædda? movunṭa pera dharmaya labā denu læbū aya men movunda pat noviya yutuya. (mesēma) ovun kerehi ek kālayak giya pasu ovungē hṛdayan gal bavaṭa pat viya. ovungen væḍi deneku pāpatarayan bavaṭa pat vūha
